gwt.material.design.client.base.mixin

Class ValidatorMixin<W extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasValue<V> & com.google.gwt.editor.client.Editor<V>,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gwt.material.design.client.base.mixin.ValidatorMixin<W,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    W - the generic type
    V - the value type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, HasValidators<V>, ValidationChangedEvent.HasValidationChangedHandlers

    public class ValidatorMixin<W extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasValue<V> & com.google.gwt.editor.client.Editor<V>,V>
extends Object
implements HasValidators<V>
    Default validator mixin. Contains all of the validation logic.
    Author:
    Steven Jardine
